subject: New York City Marathon
lead_paragraph: In what New York City Marathon officials are calling the most significant logistical change to the race since 2001, wave starts will be used to ease congestion. Instead of starting the race for everyone at the same time, the field of about 39,000 will be separated into three waves, released at 20-minute intervals.
